definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: husband's mother (NH [[חָמוֹת]], Aram. [[חֲמָתָא]]; Ar. h.ama0’un husband's mother; As. êmêtu, Zim:BP 48; Eth. h.am4t:)—only sf. [[חֲמוֹתֵךְ]] Ru 2:11, Ru 3:17; [[חֲמוֹתָהּ]] Ru 1:14 + 7 t.; [[חֲמׂתָהּ]] Mic 7:6; —of Naomi Ru 1:14, Ru 2:11, Ru 2:18, Ru 2:19, Ru 2:19, Ru 2:23, Ru 3:1, Ru 3:6, Ru 3:16, Ru 3:17; [[בַּת קָמָ֫ה בְאִêָמּהּ]] [[כַּלָּה בַּחֲמׂתָהּ]] Mic 7:6.
